Pornic is a small seaside town. It is a popular tourist destination for the French with lots of restaurants and even a sightseeing train.

by regular train services. The trains are not very frequent and services are concentrated in
the early morning and early evening for commuters during the week.

Pornic is a pleasant place to wander around. From the city centre you and follow a path which will take you to the swimming beach. The town is quite historic and the streets above the harbour are very pleasant to wander around.

Pornic is famous for its ice creams. There are many restaurants and the ones close to the harbour and generally more expensive than
those a few streets back.
It is possible to rent holiday apartments through the local tourist office (which is next to the train station).

content=The residence is made up of 2 small 3-storey apartment buildings with lifts, and twinned cottages with harmonious architecture blending in perfectly with the environment. 1 km from Noëveillard Beach.Has a private swimming pool and children's playground. Lying right beside the golf course, 900 m from the Pornic-Ouest shopping centre. Just 1 km from Noëveillard Beach and the marina and 3.5 km from the resort centre and the old harbour (all shops and services).
